page.title: 17Religion.
page.content: There are four types of religion that are observed in Kyleakin the{Free {church, the Church of Scotland,}the{ {Roman Catholic church}and the{Jehovah {Witnesses}.Most people are Christians,they go to the Free church or the church of Scotland.The Roman Catholics have to go to the Chapel,and the Jehovah Witnesses have to go to Broadford.There are not very many Roman Catholics,and Jehovah Witnesses.The Church of Scotland and the Free Church are in the parish of Strath.Sunday on the island is quite different from Sunday in a town or city.People do not go to work and don't drive about alot.The shops are not open on Sundays except for the filling station.People observe Sunday as the{Sabbath},a day of rest.
